Question: Beijing Deepcool Industries Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DeepCool

Product 1

CH780 "Panoramic" Case:
- Heavily glass-clad with tempered glass side panels and clear front panel
- Negative pressure system fan layout with no fans on the front panel
- Dual chamber case design with three mounting positions for liquid cooler radiators
- Packed with connectors including five USB ports and 3.5mm audio jack
- Available in black and white versions with a retail price of 179.99 EUR or 189.99 EUR

Product 2

LS720S and LS520S Zero Dark Liquid CPU Coolers:
- 4th generation DeepCool pump and efficient microchannel design
- Aluminum radiators with FK120 fans and no lighting
- Supports AMD (AM5 and AM4) and Intel (LGA 1700, LGA1200/LGA115x) platforms
- LS720S Zero Dark retailing for approximately 104.99 EUR and LS520S Zero Dark for about 89.99 EUR
Summary_cn:
DeepCool

产品1

CH780 “全景”机箱：
- 采用钢化玻璃侧板和透明前面板的玻璃覆盖
- 负压系统风扇布局，前面板无风扇
- 双室设计，可安装三个液冷散热器
- 配备五个USB接口和3.5毫米音频插孔等连接器
- 有黑色和白色版本，零售价为179.99欧元或189.99欧元

产品2

LS720S和LS520S“无光”液冷CPU散热器：
- 第四代DeepCool泵和高效微通道设计
- 铝制散热器，配备FK120风扇，无灯光
- 支持AMD（AM5和AM4）和Intel（LGA 1700，LGA1200/LGA115x）平台
- LS720S Zero Dark零售价约为104.99欧元，LS520S Zero Dark约为89.99欧元
